reviewText: If you are a fan of ecchi/harem anime then To love ru is one of the most famous out there.  The 4 stars is for the relatively cheap case and lack of extras.

lol i love To Love Ru Darkness XD and i purchased it July 5th at Anime Expo XD people may be concerned about the quality of the anime because its on one disc, because they usually space it out, like putting eps 1-8 on the first disc and 9-12 on the 2nd disc, but rest assured...i watched it later that night and...IT BEAUTIFUL XD full 1080p...i talked to the sentai ppl there, asking them numerous questions about the quality, one disc, and other stuff, but im not gonna go too much into details lol sry ^^' so long story short they have new technology that allows them to do so, and because To Love Ru Darkness isn't english dubbed they can fit all the eps on one blu-ray disc ^-^ but if it was dubbed then that's 2 audio tracks for EACH episode on one disc and that takes up A LOT of memory...which is why they and most studios i guess space the eps out on 2 dvd's, to keep good quality ^-^...To Love Ru Darkness is beautiful and 1 disc is convenient cuz u don't gotta get up to change the disc's for a while lol XD ENJOOOOY!! hopefully this was helpful and encouraging ^-^

The best of the 3 seasons. The first season is a classic & a whole lot of fun. The 2nd season was a bunch of shorts (about 10 minutes each) that didn't seem to continue the story-line all that much, which was disappointing. It got old, fast. This 3rd season's artwork is better and the story-line seems to flow better from episode to episode & the fan fare is top notch (exactly what we all wanted). I will say though that there are 2 scenes that really are semi-porn. It kind of cheapened the series a bit & I can't figure out why they even added those scenes. However, I think they totally got this season down & I'm looking forward to season 4 coming out later this year.
Exciting and funny
I enjoy it but it was all over the place. It had to many new people and not a clear story. If they had another one. I hope they clean up the story.

This series has been fun to watch except for one thing. The leading male is a worthless little typically portrayed Japanese boy who is scared of his own shadow when in the presence of beautiful girls. They don't have to make this series into a porno type flick, but what male at that age recoils in horror when he see's a naked girl. He can't even muster the courage to kiss a girl, this type of action causes me to want to choke him out. However, the story lines, the lovely ladies and their escapades, the especially the adorable Momo provides some hilarious and heartwarming scenes. All in all this is a really fun film to watch. The only time that the kid comes through is at the end, and that causes Momo to backtrack with her antics.
Excellent show, wish it was dubbed
KAMI-SAMA!!!! OH THANK YOU FOR THIS UNCENSORED BLURAY

This is miss-rated: it is at the least aTV-MA but more like a 17+. As examples, in 1:09 minutes,Momo is both bottomless,breast exposed and stratling Riko in his bed,at 1 minute 58,Lala is naked in the hallway,at about 6 minutes,Riko trips going down the stairs and puts his head up Kotegawa's shirt and pulls her panties off with his mouth,( shown in slo-mo), Momo is naked in the bath astride Riko and at 16 minutes,10 seconds, the mind-contoled friends of Riko grab Yami-chan,AKA Golden Darkness, spread her legs and rip her top exposing her B+/C cute boobs. Doesn't sound like TV14 to me.
The T&A romp doesn't slow down much. The lead players in this series are Momo,Riko,Yami and the new girl,Mea who has connection to Yami. Mea is controlled by her Master, a female whose identity is not reveiled and is using Mea to reactivate Yami's killer mode  to return her to the loneliness of the life of an assassin in what she calls,Project Darkness.
This season has a serious aspect as well as a delightfully enhanced quantity and quality of nudity,not just boobs,either: it seems there is much more bare bottoms in this series than all the other series combined thus far and panties are not just pulled down,they are pulled or taken off at a fast and regular pace. Bottomless is the rule,delightfully so.
The good news is that the effort by some pervert to sexify Mekan, Riko's middle school sister, seems to have been put on hopefully a permanate hold as she is neither molested nor fondled in any manner. Mikan is the one that keeps the series on some sort of even-keel with her dead-panning straight-man humor and observations. Her bath nude scenes are such nothing is shown and there are only a few panty exposures with one showing her with a new and cute wiggle,common for girls her age.
Momo's intent is to extablish a harem for Riko in her series-long,Project Harem. She pulls out all the stops.
This series has both a serious plot and a just plain nasty one,both well thought out and involved.
Yami gets naked a lot. She even faces the indignation of loosing her panties just before she sets on Riko's face.....words fail to adequatley describe the scene further; Riko gets his face sat on alot during this season.
Riko himself is nothing more than the maypole all the pretty girls dance around. Three of the girls get to see his "member" up close and personal, with Nana,the twin that would just as soon have his liver on a stake,going into near shock afterwords.
  The beauty and quality of character design as well as that of the breasts,particuarly of the nipples,does not disappoint.
Well recommed.

Ok. To Loveru Darkness, takes up where we left off in season 2.  However get ready for some changes.  Lala is no longer the Main Character and only makes a few guest appearances in many of the episdoes.  The story line will focus instead on Momo, Rito, Yami "the golden Darkness", and a new female character.
  Momo has decided to make Rito a Harem out of all his female friends here on Earth. Especially her.  Momo apparently takes after her father in that shes very manipulative and decisive on what she wants.
  Yami is being stalked by the Darkness Assassins guild which was thought to be destroyed.  Who wish to turn her back into an assassin.
  Rito is pretty much the same, however he seems far less able to protect himself from the atttacks of his female friends.
  While there still is comedy, this season is MUCH more serious than the other ones.  The sexual assault have ramped up to an entirely new LEVEL.  Where before it was accidental and usually comedic, the new series has slipped some what from Harem into HENTAI.
  Momo slips into bed with Rito like Lala used to, only Ritos hormones have started taking over.  Instead of quietly waking next to her, Rito has taken to molesting in his sleep.  Fondling, stroking, licking and fingering.  Momo reciprocates and sexually assaults Rito,while awake, several times, with various stages of success.
  Nudity and Fan Service, and sexuality abound in this new series,  Frankly not entirely for the better.  This series is alot more adult and is missing some of the Fun of the older series.
  Over all its still a good series.  Just be prepared for LICKING, and LICKING, and LICKING,...... and more LICKING.
it's tough to find anything funnier, dirtier, and more entertaining than this show
